body.p: Registrere epoastačujuhusa vuostáiváldit ođasreivve ja dieđu go giinu cealká.

Buot váldostivrra áirasat leat vuolláičállán álgaga sámegiela viiddis ealáskahttinprográmma ráhkadeamis. Áirasat háliidit nannet sámegiela juohke hálddahussuorggis, ásahit giellaguovddáa, háhkat sámegielat bargosajiid Ohcejohkii ja geavahit sámegiela Ohcejoga vuovdaleamis.

Ái álgga dahkkojuvvui juo juovlamánus 15. beaivvi ja gielddaráđđehus lea nammadan bargojoavkku prográmma ráhkadeami várás ođđajagemánus. Sáhttá dadjat ahte Sámi Siidda guhkit áiggi mihttomearri lea ollauhttojuvvomin dáinna mearrádusain, ja sáhttáge leat berotahtti lohkat eanet prográmma sisdoalu ja ollauhttima birra.
Viiddis prográmma Gielddaráđđehusa čoahkkingirjji lea váldostivrra álgaga sisdoallu ahte Ohcejoga gildii galgá ráhkadit viiddis sámegiela ovddidanprográmma. Prográmmas galgá leat:
1. G eavatla rávvagat virgeolbmuide sámi giellalága ollauhttimis
3. Sámegiela geavaheamis Ohcejoga vuovdaleamis ja sámegielat bálvalusaid nannemis ja maiddái vejola sámegiela ealáskahttindoaimmain.
Prográmma galggaii ráhkadit ovttasbarggus buot hálddahusgottiiguin ja prográmma ráhkadeami várás galggaii vuođđuduvvot bargojoavku.

Giellaguovddá Álgagis boahtá maid ovdan ahte: Galggaii dutkat vejolavuođaid vuođđudit sámegiela guovddáa, man bargun livččii earret eará ollauhttit giellaealáskahttinfidnuid, ordnet giellakurssaid, dahkat dutkamuaid sámegiela geavaheamis ja vejolaččat sámegiela jorgalan- ja dulkonguovddáin.
Álgagis čujuhit Suoma olmmovuoigatvuohtapolitihkkii guoski čilgehusas máinnauvvon sámegiela ealáskahttinprográmmii, man ráhkadeapmái stáhtaráđđi lea čatnasan.

Bargojoavku Gielddaráđđehus lea nammadan bargojoavkku válmmatallat ái. Esko Härkönen evttohii ahte bargojoavkku ságadoallin nammaduvvo Kati Eriksen. Ságadoalli Antti Katekeetta evttohii, ahte bargojoavkku lahttun nammaduvvo Veikko Guttorm. Esko Härkönena ja ságadoalli evttohusat dohkkehuvvojedje ovttajienalaččat.
Dasa lassin bargojoavku sáhttá geavahit dárbbu mielde veahkkin áedovdilahtuid. Bargojovkui čállin mearreduvvo ealáhus- ja ovddidanhoavda Hanna-Leena Talvensaari. Čállán: Torkel Rasmussen
Why do I bother calling up peploe when I can just read this!
The Sami language is sooOO llvoey! I recognized it before I saw the description in the video! Sami language is million billion trillion QUADRILLION times better than mandarin!

Good to hear from you Mike. I always know ealctxy what to write to get you to pipe up, right? Reasonable people can disagree on these rankings, but Syracuse did just lose AT HOME to Pitt by DOUBLE DIGITS. I understand the Kansas-Cornell analogy by we all know Kansas would beat Cornell 9 out of 10 times. That"s the definition of a fluke. Can we say that about Pitt-Cuse? I don"t think so. Let me see more and then I will adjust accordingly. As for West Virginia and Villanova, I"ve had them 1-2 in that order since October and I see no reason to change that right now. Nova losing to Temple in one of those crazy Big 5 games (where upsets are commonplace) doesn"t upset the apple cart in my mind. Again, it"ll all play out. I actually enjoyed Boeheim"s postgame after Seton Hall, even his potshot at the media about OOC schedule strength (at least the quotes were interesting and usable). Much better than the normal blah-blah-blah you get from a lot of the other guys. Bitter, the point about last year"s Big East is how it was the deepest league ever. Obviously no league was better at the top than those mid-80s Big Easts. If it makes you feel better the next time it comes up I will put an asterisk and a footnote making this distinction. Piratefocus,I"ve been beating the drums for Fero Hall as you know, but he is way too small to play center in the Big East. Have you seen the size of the postmen on the other teams? Big John is a space-eater and is useful in short spurts (alas, his knees have robbed him of the rest). Fero has to beef up big-time before he can hold his own at center for any reasonable lengths.

I always enjoy Seth"s ignhsits as a breath of fresh air especially with CBS embracing people like Billy Packer, whose over-stated commentary got old quickly then his replacement Clark Kellogg"s his faux-Clyde routine One of the things Seth conveniently forgets is that some of the cupcake games are regionally politically correct I think that UCONN being on the bubble might be more of a reality with Coach Calhoun"s medical leave of absence Coach Blainey was a genius hire but he"s not Coach Calhoun I am hoping the American Sports Vatican (aka Notre Dame) falls off that bubble they need to establish a reputation of athletic excellence, not just a memory of the Digger Days !!!Glad to see someone speaking nationally about Da Hall and I agree with his evalaution !!!Lastly, I certainly hope Duke"s Singler stays for his senior year it will help the team and recognize that he"s not an NBA calibre player now and might never be

Best Presentation SecretsThis book impressed me with the idea of keniepg a simple focus â one message I can sell with elegance and enthusiasm to my audience. I learned that what my audience wants is much more than information, but a clear and reasonable solution to a problem they have, and the feeling of confidence that they can make it work for them. When I think of the few speakers who really got through to me, motivated me to do something different or to make a change, the techniques in this book certainly apply. I was also amazed at the ratio of preparation to performance, and that many hours of practice and preparation are required for a smooth, âeffortlessâ presentation. It makes me ask myself as a speaker, what do I know and believe in that can work for others? Can I communicate it in a way that speaks to the audienceâs most basic needs and desires? This book says, yes, you can!

This book says, yes, you can!
QuotesChimp can buy additional safety on your car for a supplementary premium. These accessories in neuro-scientific vehicle insurance policy are called sanctiones.

February 27, 2013 - 12:44 pm You ladies ROCKED it! I"m a hug fan of hot yoga . it"s ineibdrcle how you can connect with yourself and let go of the day just by moving and thinking a different way. It"s not about the calories, it"s about: What can my body do and how am I going to give it the grace to do that? . It"s almost like saying, HEY body. I"m going to listen to you now. Rather than putting it on the elliptical, taking the time to work through your body"s capabilities helps you to think and live better. Mwah"s.

I agreed with and was glad to see Harvey not sttnriag in the UConn game. His mood swings just isnt good enough. I think Lawrence and Theodore sharing the point guard position is just going to get better and better.The other position needing the change now is in the Center position. The UConn game shows proof again that Jon Garcia just isnt quick enough and doesnt have the Center moves to compete against the Centers in the Big East.Farrakon Hall is getting better and better and I think he should be sharing that position with Pope with Jeff Robinson coming to share the Power Forward Position with Pope. Then have Garcia come off the bench to deal with the oppositions bench Centers later in the game.He is just not Big East Good enough and is hurting the team. A couple of times you can see Garcia back away from positions underneath the basket where he could have made the easier rebound or block outs.

I"m a fan of both sports and to say bnoxig fans are in a different class is just ignorant. It seems that the ignorant ones are a fraction (not all, as some bnoxig fans have knowledge) of the bnoxig fans. It"s not hard to see that they are two different sports. Just because it involves striking doesn"t make it the same. Kickbnoxig and bnoxig involve striking but are night in day besides that, different rules and options. There"s a long line because people are lined up to watch the event, to meet the fighters and participate in the whole experience. That"s what bnoxig has been missing for a long time. I miss those days when there was always a good bnoxig match on, now we have fighters ducking each other and having press conference wars instead of getting in the ring!

Gjutformar av benhorn finns anrnas e4ven fre5n Hedeby, i de fall de e4r publicerade e4r det fre4mst Hans Drescher som skrivit kolla i Ausgrabungen in Haithabu (de grf6na bf6ckerna) 4:an men e4ven 7:an. Har ff6r mig att minst en form fre5n Hedeby har bevarade styrstift av je4rn. Tenn- och blysmycken e4r ju ingen samisk exklusivitet under je4rne5ler/tidig medeltid. Det finns e4ven ett antal fina formar fre5n England fre5n samma tid.

I love this post, and I love looking at this blog. I recnetly re-decorated my room inspired by Scandinavian minimalist and this helps give me more ideas. I love to have a simple but inspiring place where I can work and relax as more creative thoughts come through - which I need as I"m an Advertising Design student :) Thank you! No Matter How the areas are decided, Quotes Chimp utilize their record-assembling capabilities to calculate the prices of vehicle insurance statements within each recognized area. The insurance market"s abstract thought for this particular prices mechanics is the reality that many injuries happen inside a number of kilometers of where the car is garaged. Therefore, the corporations genuinely believe that areas supply an exact foundation for pinpointing their threat. And, as we observed in Section 2, the buying price of insurance is conditioned by the danger of reduction to the corporation.
